attributes.action: Instate Andrew Gates as MP for Northampton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Andrew Gates has long been a follower of politics and all that comes with it. We are hoping that by advertising this position his dream can come true and Northampton can finally see the kind of MP they want to have.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
